definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: So, the third guy is when we come back to the origin along the diagonal.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分沿對角線回到原點。

sentences.english: Draw a square, and then cross the two diagonals.
sentences.chinese: 畫一個正方形，然後畫兩條對角線。

sentences.english: This is prefaced by the words “Let me explain, ” which is a key transitional phrase that catches the attention of a diagonal reader.
sentences.chinese: 以“讓我解釋一下”這句話抓住對角線讀者注意力。

sentences.english: A pattern of crisscross diagonal lines.
The diagonal inertia tensor of mass relative to the center of mass.
sentences.chinese: 相對於重心的質量的慣性張量對角線。

sentences.english: So, our ball starts in the top-left of the screen, and starts moving diagonally down-right when the program starts.
sentences.chinese: 即剛開始從左上角開始，沿對角線向右下角運動。

sentences.english: The Elegant Rails railing no longer clips through the post when placed diagonally .
sentences.chinese: 優雅的鋼軌欄杆不再剪輯後通過時，放在對角線。

sentences.english: Screen size is measured diagonally, in inches.
sentences.chinese: 屏幕大小按對角線來進行衡量，以寸爲單位。

sentences.english: That means I'm going to go diagonally like this.
The Diagonal area is holding several preliminary competitions.
sentences.chinese: 對角線區將舉辦多項比賽的預選賽。

sentences.english: It starts out in a straight line and then it hops off on a diagonal.
sentences.chinese: 馬以直線出發但必須飛對角線。

sentences.english: Leading lines are most effective as diagonals.
sentences.chinese: 對角線是最好的引導線。

sentences.english: It was calf-length, straight, and decorated only by a few diagonal lines.
sentences.chinese: 這是小牛的長度，直線，和裝飾，只由少數對角線線。

sentences.english: A transverse or diagonal member of a vault.
sentences.chinese: 拱頂上成橫向或者對角線的支撐結構。

sentences.english: Look at the white diagonals and you will see why.
sentences.chinese: 看着白色的對角線你就知道爲什麼了。

sentences.english: The icon appears as two small squares that are in a diagonal.
sentences.chinese: 圖標出現，顯示爲兩個呈對角線位置的小正方形。
